content.rendered:
Directed by Shakun Batra.

Written by Shakun Batra. Ayesha DeVitre. Spandan Mishra.

Cast Rishi Kapoor(Amarjeet Kapoor). Rajat Kapoor(Harsh Kapoor – Dad). Ratna Pathak Shah(Sunita Kapoor – Mom (as Ratna Pathak)). Fawad Khan(Rahul Kapoor). Sidharth Malhotra(Arjun Kapoor). Alia Bhatt(Tia Malik). Anuradha Chandan(Anu). Vikram Kapadia(Shashi Chacha). Anahita Oberoi(Neetu Chachi). Aakriti Dobhal(Bunkoo). Rupa Kamath(Timmy Masi). Pradeep Pradhan(Kishore (Tia’s Cook)). Niti Apurva Patel(Selfie Nurse). Sukant Goel(Wasim). Aalekh Kapoor(Sahil) . Rahul Arjun Adsul(Bodybuilder). Carlos Augusto Tavares Canhisares(Rahul’s Boyfriend). Elena Roxana Maria Fernandes(Rahul’s Agent). Aditya Gunavanthe(Delivery Boy (as Gunavanthe Aditya)). Justin(Dharmendra). Arbaaz Kadwani(Sharic). Sanjay Kanojiya(Toll Booth Attendant). Narendra Khatri(Bodybuilding competition announcer). Sonam Nair(Drunk girl in Kar Gayi Chul). Burjor Patel(Chowsky Kaka). Olena Paul(Friends’s Mother). Pradeep(Kishore). Raju(Geishu (Dog)). Promod Rampal(Bald Man). Chandrajit Ranavde(Broker Makhija). Faheem Shaikh(Boobly). Muskan Khanna Sharan(Preet). Arya Sharma(Zoey). Amarjeet Singh(Plumber). Amarjeet Singh(Plumber). Ram Singh(Mucchad Paanwala). Edward Sonnenblick(Dan). Sulekshna(Nurse). Gary John Tantony(Friend’s Father)

Language Hindi.

Producers Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Pravin Khairnar. Apoorva Mehta. Sanjay Mehta.

Production Dharma Productions.
